title: Lucian chroma not working
body: Idk if it's bugged, but I bought it the other day and it's not working.

replies.body:
Hey CheesusTheWheel -

Would you happen to have a screenshot of your champion select? 

You should be able to select the color swatch in champion select, and it should load in properly. 

Any additional details you can provide would be super helpful! ^-^
I'm mobile at the moment, but I will post it later.but when I pick the champ the color options don't show. I have two other skins for Lucian and they work fine. But chroma don't
Sweet deal. I'll keep an eye out for your post. ^-^
Sorry first link didn't work
Do you see them/can you use them in the new champion select?
can you give me spirit guard udyr
You can see them in the new champ select. But not blind pick.

On top of what KateyKhaos said, it is a lot more helpful if you attempt to recreate the bug, and fill out a full report if you don't get it working. It really helps the support staff help you.

Also, sometimes it can just straighten itself out if it's just a fluke thing.
